directions: Place the garbanzo beans, garlic, tahini, salt, orange juice, jalapeno chiles, avocado, and cilantro in the bowl of a food processor. Process until smooth. Adjust thickness by stirring in desired amount of reserved liquid from garbanzo beans or olive oil. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained, liquid reserved
3 fresh jalapeno chiles, with seeds and ribs removed
title: Nicole's Garbanzo-Citrus Spread
